content:
In the afternoon of March 26, the enemy struck the civilian infrastructure of Sumy.

About thisreportedSumy Ova.

According to local authorities, all the necessary services work on the spot.

Previously, people were not injured. The effects of the attack are clarified.

As reported by the Armyinform, as a result of yesterday's Russian rocket firing of Odessasuffered10 people.

Besides the enemy againappliesHeaded aircraft in Kherson region.

Significant destructionfixedIn the village of Red Lighthouse of Beryslav district, which last night the occupiers dumped managed aircraft.
title: Aviation of the Russian Federation struck the amount
description: This was reported by Sumy Ova. According to local authorities, all work on the spot ...
author: Army Inform
